rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MEC2414, MEC2420, TRC2100}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MEC2414, MEC2420, TRC2100}

description: A systematic method of capturing design requirements, tools for ideation, estimation and decision-making. Primary and secondary manufacturing processes, assembly techniques. Engineering graphics for problem-solving, manufacturing communication and ideation. Report writing, teamwork in solving design problems involving the integration of mechanical elements in prototype conception, construction and testing.
